page.title: 07CAMBORNE HIGHER EDUCATION
page.content: The Cornwall College of Higher & Further Education was{founded in 1928 by the{Holman brothers}of Camborne. They asked the school of Metalliferous Mining & Cornwall County Council to form day classes for their apprentices. Situated between Camborne & Redruth, its catchment area extends from {Penzance to Truro}and nationally for its Graphical Design course. The Tech offers many courses ranging from catering to engineering.It supplies most of the hairdressing & catering apprentiships in Cornwall. CCFHE is the venue for many night school classes.The most popular cake decorating & flower arranging. CCFHE has 2000 full-time & 5000 part time students with 300+ full time staff & 200 part time staff.{
